skills.skill: Computer-assisted design software proficiency (Revit, SketchUp, AutoCAD)
Education, transportation, and community architecture experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform all phases of architectural work from conceptual design through construction administration.
Provide professional architectural consultation in the planning, design, and coordination of large complex projects.
Investigate, evaluate, and recommend design solutions that best meet the client's needs.
Independently apply advanced architectural concepts and designs.
Carry out complex or novel assignments requiring the development of new or improved techniques and procedures.
Provide technical guidance to less experienced architects.

education_certification.credential: Experience in education, transportation, and community architecture
